column5: Well, after a tough loss/start to the season having blown a motor we kind of got a little stir crazy .... so we decided to sharpen the skills for 2011.  I was lucky enough to borrow a boat for the opener so it wasn't a complete right off.  Its gonna be a good season ! Good luck bassin'this year guys !  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h17SLsTK8SA  Lots of Erie info and reports to come this season
